body.name: Basic Ergonomic Swivel Office Chair, Black Desk Chair, Executive Chair - Breathable Mesh Backrest, Height-Adjustable, Comfortable Seating, Easy Assembly(Mid Height, Green)
features: Breathable Mesh Backrest: Our office chair features an ergonomic design with a breathable mesh backrest, ensuring optimal airflow and preventing back pain even after long hours of sitting.
Height-Adjustable: The height-adjustable seat allows for various adjustments, enabling you to maintain an optimal sitting posture and providing ultimate comfort.

360° Swiveling for Comfortable Seating: With the ability to rotate 360 degrees, our office chair offers a comfortable seating experience, allowing you to easily reach different areas of your workspace without straining.

Optimal Seating Comfort: The thick padding of our chair provides optimal seating comfort, offering good elasticity and a better fit for your body. Say goodbye to discomfort and hello to a productive workday.

Durable and Floor-Friendly: The base of our chair is equipped with 5 safety castors made of high-quality nylon, ensuring high abrasion resistance, smooth movement, and floor protection. Plus, it is easy to assemble and clean, making your life easier.
body.description: Introducing our Essential Ergonomic Swivel Office Chair, the perfect addition to your workspace! Designed with your comfort in mind, this desk chair offers a breathable mesh backrest that keeps you cool and comfortable throughout the day. The height-adjustable feature ensures a personalized seating experience, promoting proper posture and reducing strain on your back. With its executive design, this chair adds a touch of sophistication to any office setting. Assembly is a breeze, thanks to the easy-to-follow instructions included. Invest in your well-being and productivity with our Essential Ergonomic Swivel Office Chair - the ultimate combination of style, comfort, and functionality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It was easy to put together even though I believe the instructions say to use the incorrect screws (there are long and short screws). But honestly, I could be wrong about that. Either way I made it work! The chair reclines slightly, I certainly wouldn't consider this chair to be reclining.... Not unless I'm reclining wrong as well. There is a large knob under the seat with a plus and minus sign that I can't turn/twist in either direction, its really hard to turn or its not meant to turn, and I'm not sure what it's used for 🤔 . But I still like the look of the chair, it's comfortable for my big hips, and the price is right! I also like that the arms move out the way!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Looks used & scratched - hard assembly
reviews.reviewText: When it initially came I saw that there were scratches on the silver the legs of the chair but I decided to put it together since I needed this for my new work from home job. The part that was hard to assemble was the back of the chair and the screws didn’t probably.go in them and I was also missing the letter H in regards to parts. The chair is actually not very wide and is not very comfortable. Since I don’t wanna do this assemble put everything back together, I will give this to my daughter And buy a better quality chair. Very disappointing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to put together and very solid sturdy office chair. Very comfortable and fantastic price. I absolutely love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Solid chair, but...
reviews.reviewText: Bought this chair for an additional workstation at home. Overall, the chair is pretty decent in design with a few caveats. Came in a box with a second left side armrest (free of charge I guess). Assembly was fairly easy with the exception of having two of the five wheels that won't fully seat. (Since I'm using it on carpet, it's no big deal for me). Next, the seat bottom is hard as a rock (you'll want to invest in a decent seat cushion) and not very comfortable. Also, the tilt control is very stiff and does not offer much back tilt. Overall, chair is not at all so. Don't think I would recommend this chair if you are intending to use it for longer than 20 minutes or so. Instructions could be a little bit clearer on which direction the tilt and height control lever should face when assembling.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This chair is made of a thick plastic similar, I think, to the thick plastic used to make playground furniture for toddlers. Metal is used where needed. The chair rolls nicely on my carpeting but I bought a chair mat anyway to keep from rolling ruts into the carpeting. The chair is comfortable enough but the back is not at all adjustable. This becomes uncomfortable after an hour or so and I like that this feature keeps me from sitting at my desk all day! The arms flip up perfectly to allow me to wheel the chair under my desk when not in use. The arms are a nice touch for an inexpensive desk chair and comfortable enough for the couple of hours a day that I sit at my desk and want them in the down position. I really like the color and the pouch on the back of the chair. It holds more than I thought it would and it is very useful. If the company could figure out a solution to allow the seat to move back a few inches I’d give this office chair 5 stars!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The customer service from the seller was great. The wrong screws were in my package and they made it right. The chair itself is miserable. I work from home several days of the week and the chair is so uncomfortable. It has made my tailbone sore even after working. I’ve tried multiple pillows and nothing works.

reviews.reviewerName: Soft. Affordable. Well worth the money. Great gift
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Assembly was easy. Love the comfort. Priced right!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Uncomfortable and hard to assemble
reviews.reviewText: The chair seems a bit too small. I can't prop my legs up on the chair or even sit on my legs which is a huge thing for me. The chair is uncomfy and there's not much back support. I had to put a blanket down on the seat to make it a tiny bit more comfortable. Setting it up was a nightmare. Every piece seemed to not want to fit together. I wouldn't recommend this chair to any of my friends. Bad chair.
